channel.title: Project Territh v2
channel.description:
Since Project Territh v1 was a unsuccessful and a "Unknown" server, I would like to start out new. I would like some help with this server. I would like a team of about 5-7 people, because I honestly hate working with giant teams with people up to 15. Such Bullshit.. Anyway, this project will be successful, not like my last one.
Goals: Fun minigames Strong Economy 24/7 Enough players online 2 worlds Members
What have I done? Well....
I have a basic standard source Added Anti Syi and I bought a Vps. (GOOD ONE) Working on making economy Strong, very strong Basic client Starting on Sql and Html based website Working on new minigames which you will see soon. ;) 317 If you want to join then please fill out a basic Application.
Name: MSN/contact info: Experience: Position: Ideas/Suggestions:
I need 4 server programmers (with me)
2 client programmers
1 Website designer
Feed back would be helpful DON'T flame.
This may not seem very Professional but I want to get some members first then this will be a well done project.
I've been wanting to work on a project for some time now. Please consider this. Thanks I will add more info and progress as I go on, and get more members. -PT

Project Territh:

@ Amayzing I Need a Dedicated website designer your in. =)

Awesome.

Add me on MSN so we can discuss further details.

Alex.amayzing@hotmail.com

item.title: Project Territh v2
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

Name: Alex
MSN: Alex.amayzing@hotmail.com
Position: Website Designer
Experience: I’ve been developing websites for over two and a half years now. I’m skilled when it comes to creating things with advanced CMS’ such as Joomla and even more advanced when it comes to designing forums. I have an Invision Power Board license which I’ll be willing to use for this project. If you dislike IPB, I could use any other free forum software; MyBB, SMF, phpBB, etc… The only thing I will not do is use nulled (illegally obtained) software because that goes nowhere.

I hope you take me into consideration.

Read full topic
